cast.name: 帕德玛·拉克施密 Padma Lakshmi

awards:
第30届哥谭独立电影奖(2020)
　　最佳突破剧集（短篇迷你剧）(提名)
this_title: Taste the Nation With Padma Lakshmi Season 1
trans_title: 与帕德玛·拉克什米尝遍美国 第一季
introduction: Host Padma Lakshmi takes audiences on a journey across America, exploring the rich and diverse food culture of various immigrant groups, seeking out the people who have so heavily shaped what American food is today.
chinese_title: 与帕德玛·拉克什米尝遍美国 第一季
foreign_title: Taste the Nation With Padma Lakshmi Season 1
